    • Method Detail

      • addPiece

        public boolean addPiece(int column)
        Attempts to add piece to requested column
        Parameters:
        column -
        Returns:
        true if piece was added, or false if addition failed

      • hasWon

        public boolean hasWon()
        Checks if the current player has won. Will fill winningPieces with the 4 in a row if they won.
        Returns:
        true if player has won, false if they haven't

      • checkDraw

        public boolean checkDraw()
        Will check if board is full and no moves left
        Returns:
        true if no moves left, false if moves are available.

      • print

        public void print()
        Prints out the board to terminal

      • getPlayer

        public int getPlayer()
        Returns:
        current player

      • isAIGame

        public boolean isAIGame()
        Returns:
        true if single player game, false if multiplayer game.

      • getAITurn

        public int getAITurn()
        Completes AI move and turns off isAITurn flag
        Returns:
        move made by the AI

      • toggleAIGame

        public void toggleAIGame(boolean AItoggle)
        Toggles between an AIGame and multiplayer game Only works if game is not running (ie. in setup menu)
        Parameters:
        AItoggle - sets flag for AIGame

      • toggleGameState

        public void toggleGameState(boolean running)
        Starts and stops the game Also resets the player turn counter
        Parameters:
        running - starts or stops the game

      • resetGame

        public void resetGame()
        Resets the game with a cleared board

      • isRunning

        public boolean isRunning()
        Returns:
        true if game is running, false if its stopped

      • getNumPlayers

        public int getNumPlayers()
        Returns:
        number of players in the game

      • setAI

        public void setAI(int difficulty)
        Sets the difficulty of the AI
        Parameters:
        difficulty - the setting for the difficulty

      • isWinPiece

        public boolean isWinPiece(int column,
                 int row)
        Checks a piece to see if its one of the winning pieces
        Parameters:
        column - the column number
        row - the row number
        Returns:
        true if a winning piece, false if not or game hasn't finished

      • setpieceFalling

        public void setpieceFalling(boolean falling)
        Toggles whether a piece is falling in any column

      • makeAITurn

        public void makeAITurn()
        Sets gameState to the AI's turn

      • ifAITurn

        public boolean ifAITurn()
        Returns:
        true if AI's turn, false if it isn't

      • getPieceFalling

        public boolean getPieceFalling()
        Returns:
        true if piece falling, false if no piece falling.
